front.title: Leveraging In-network Storage in P2P LiveStreaming

abstract.t: DECADE is an in-network storage infrastructure which is under discussions and constructions. It can be integrated into Peer-to- Peer (P2P) applications to achieve more efficient content distributions. This document represents a detailed example of how to integrate DECADE into P2P live streaming (a popular P2P application). Specifically, it describes mainly about: 1) a preliminary DECADE client API; 2) a P2P live streaming integration with DECADE; 3) a testing on our DECADE integrarion and 4) an application performance analysis from the test.
